source: TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_CEREMONYSHOP01578_000_000<tab>If you're planning to hold a Ceremony of Eternal Bonding here at the Sanctum, I can furnish you with assorted items to make your special day as special as can be!
target: TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_CEREMONYSHOP01578_000_000<tab>Wenn du vorhast, hier am Dom der Einkehr einen Ewigen Bund einzugehen, kann ich dich mit festlicher Kleidung und anderen Artikeln für den besonderen Anlass versorgen. Damit der Tag auch zu einem unvergesslichen Ereignis wird!

source: TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>The wares on offer are available only to those currently undertaking the quest “The Ties that Bind,” and who have yet to hold their ceremony. To accept this quest, you must possess a promise wristlet, which can be acquired via the online store.
target: TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>Diese Händlerin führt Artikel für den Spezial-Auftrag „Zeremonie des Ewigen Bundes“.

source: TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_CEREMONYSHOP01578_000_020<tab>You and your beloved were joined here at the Sanctum, were you not? I wish you all the best in your future together!
target: TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_CEREMONYSHOP01578_000_020<tab>Du bist doch hier den Ewigen Bund eingegangen, oder? Mögen die Zwölf über euer Schicksal wachen.

source: TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>The wares on offer are available only to those currently undertaking the quest “The Ties that Bind,” and who have yet to hold their ceremony. To accept this quest, you must possess a promise wristlet, which can be acquired via the online store.
target: TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>Diese Händlerin führt Artikel für den Spezial-Auftrag „Zeremonie des Ewigen Bundes“ und steht nur bis zum Ringtausch zur Verfügung.
